Package org.ensor.math.geometry

This package contains 3d geometrical constructs such as vectors, rotation matrices, etc.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IHasW
    This interface indicates that the object has a 'W' component of a vector.
    IHasX
    This interface indicates that the object has a 'X' component of a vector.
    IHasY
    This interface indicates that the object has a 'Y' component of a vector.
    IHasZ
    This interface indicates that the object has a 'Z' component of a vector.
    IMetric<VectorType>
    This method implements the concept of a metric.
    INorm  
    IPath<VectorType>
    This interface models a smooth path function which is capable of returning a vector position for any arbitrary point in time "t" along the path.
    IRealValueProjection<T>
    This interface represents a way to project an object into the real numbers.
    IVector<VectorType>
    This interface represents an element of a vector space.
    IVectorWithNorm<VectorType>
    This interface represents a vector with a norm.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EuclideanMetric
    This method defines the euclidian metric which defines the concept of distance in a euclidian geometry.
    Quaternion  
    Vector2
    This method represents an element of a 2-dimensional vector space .
    Vector3
    This method represents an element of a 3-dimensional vector space .
    Vector4
    This method represents an element of a 4-dimensional vector space .
    WProjection
    This class is a projection which returns a vector's 'W' coordinate .
    XProjection
    This class is a projection which returns a vector's 'X' coordinate .
    YProjection
    This class is a projection which returns a vector's 'Y' coordinate .
    ZProjection
    This class is a projection which returns a vector's 'Z' coordinate .

Package org.ensor.math.geometry Description

This package contains 3d geometrical constructs such as vectors, rotation matrices, etc.
